title: Advantages of Linux for Technical Audience

slides.title: What is Linux?
content: Linux is a free and open source operating system
Linux is a Unix-like operating system
Linux is a community-developed operating system

slides.title: Advantages of Linux
content: Linux is more secure than other operating systems
Linux is more stable than other operating systems
Linux is more efficient than other operating systems

slides.title: Conclusion
content: Linux is a great choice for a technical audience
Linux has many advantages over other operating systems
